thread.title: BRIEF-Broadcom Says If Qualcomm Deal Terminated Under Some Circumstances, Co Shall Pay Or Cause To Be Paid $3.6 Bln

title: BRIEF-Broadcom Says If Qualcomm Deal Terminated Under Some Circumstances, Co Shall Pay Or Cause To Be Paid $3.6 Bln
text:
#Market News February 9, 2018 / 1:27 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Broadcom Says If Qualcomm Deal Terminated Under Some Circumstances, Co Shall Pay Or Cause To Be Paid $3.6 Bln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Broadcom Ltd: 
* IF QUALCOMM DEAL TERMINATED UNDER SOME CIRCUMSTANCES, CO SHALL PAY OR CAUSE TO BE PAID $3.6 BILLION IN CASH 
* $8 BILLION REVERSE TERMINATION FEE APPLICABLE IF QUALCOMM DEAL FAILS TO GET REGULATORY APPROVAL, AMONG OTHER CONDITIONS Source text - ( bit.ly/2EVaCul ) Further company coverage:
